subject: Re: [junit] how to apply API testing using JUNIT?
msgSnippet: If it s written in Java, JUnit can be used to test it.  Whether JUnit is the best framework or not, that s an unknown to me. Read the documentation please, and

If it's written in Java, JUnit can be used to test it.  Whether JUnit is the
best framework or not, that's an unknown to me.

Read the documentation please, and then come back with specific questions.

-jason
--- Sivarama Krishnan <siva_2000_1@...> wrote:
> Hi,
> 
> can any one help me out in testing java api using
> JUNIT.
> 
> ia'm quite new to this tool.
> 
> I implemented a new HAVI API using JAVA....and i want
> to test this API using JUNIT
> 
> ....is it possible for me to test an API like HAVI
> using JUNIT. 
> 
> can anyone help me out in this type of testing.
> 
> regards,
> siva
